predicate.note: Frames file for 'encumber' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: load down

example.name: no agent
example.text: So, some see a special irony in the fact that Mr. Steinhardt, the trader, now is encumbered *trace* with a massive, illiquid airline holding.

example.name: with agent
example.text: Mary encumbered John with a bushel of cucumbers.

roleset.note: I'll bet agent is never used in real language.
